英文公告.機關地址: NO.15 , GUANGJHOU ST., JHONGJHENG DISTRICT , TAIPEI CITY10066 , Taiwan(R.O.C.)
英文公告.標案名稱: 2012 Procurement of Meals at Yilan Detention Center
英文公告.廠商地址: No.8, Ln. 109, Ziyou Rd., Daliao Dist., Kaohsiung City 831, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: Bidder Eligibility Summary: Bidders must have vendor registration or certificate of establishment for their respective businesses that meet the requirements of this procurement (i.e. the business activities shall include catering or cooking). The documents to be submitted are as follows:1.Vendor registration or certificate of establishment,company registration or business registration documents, certificate of establishment or registration, certificate of factory registration, industry registration certificate, business license for operation, document attesting to the business opening, filing document, or other supporting document confirming the legal registration of establishment issued by the government or an authorized organization; The aforesaid documents can be printed by the bidder from the Websites of the Competent Authorities.(Please note that the Unified business certificate was abolished on April 12, 2009. Do not submit the business certificate as the document proof.) 2.Tax statement of the most recent term; any vendor who has not yet obtained the proof of tax statement for the most recent term may submit the proof of tax statement from one prior term; A newly established business who has not yet filed tax for the first term may submit the official letter confirming the business establishment issued by the business tax authorities in charge, and the document attesting to the application for the purchase of uniform invoice; 3.The operating license of the professional chef; 4.The certificate of professional chef issued by the trade (or industry) association recognized by the local health authorities; 5.Proof of bidder’s membership in the local culinary trade (or industry) association; 6.Proof of bidder’s credit-worthiness (i.e. having no record of a bounced check);7.Bidder’s statement of tender.

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.1.14機關名稱：內政部入出國及移民署
